short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to navigate web with a keyboard. Press '/' to locate links. Scroll up-down with 'k' and 'j'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides by far the easiest way to browse web pages with only a keyboard.

Locate links on the page by pressing '/' and typing any part of the link text. Scroll page up and down by pressing 'k' and 'j' buttons.
